item.description:
You're not the only one who hasn't seen The Town! Come see it with me on Thursday, December 16, which the Somerville Theater says on its website will be our last chance.

Here's a quote from the Boston Globe's review back in September: ". . . Affleck gives [his] voice a velvety growl a woman would remember . . . ." Honestly. What is taking me so long?!

Look for me and my bright red backpack in the lobby of the Somerville Theater from 6:45 to 7:00. At that point, we can head into the auditorium. The movie starts at 7:10, and I certainly don't want to miss one word from Ben Affleck!

If you arrive late, look for me in the lobby of the theater after the movie. I'll linger there for a few minutes to make sure we have everyone. And we can decide then if we would like to head to the Diesel Cafe or another spot for some conversation.

See you at the Somerville Theater!
Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: See the event description. Look for my bright red backpack.
item.name: The Town
